Subject: How to start a job without using the Web UI?

I am currently running a website (www.kidzdomain.org) that allows a user to=
 type a URL in a given textbox and my Java program will validate the conten=
t of the website. I want to use Heritrix ver. 1.14.3 but I do not want to u=
se the Web UI to start a job. 

Can I start a job (user's URI)in Heritrix t=
o crawl the site without using the Web UI? If I can, what are the possible =
ways of me doing that?

I will use my program to show the result after the =
harvest in my website.

Thank you.

Ahmed.
